#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int a,b,k1,k2,s=0;
	scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
	while(a>0&&b>0)
	{
		s=0;
			while(a>0&&b>0)
			{
				k1=a%10;
				k2=b%10;
				if(k1+k2>=10)
				{
				s++;}
				a=a/10;b=b/10;
			}
			if(s==0)
			printf("No carry operation.\n");
			else if(s>1)
			printf("%d carry operations.\n",s);
			else
			printf("1 carry operation.\n");
			scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
	}
	return 0;
}
